docs.text: 📚Cookbook 🇨🇳中文文档 Personal Knowledge Database wiki Library Recently update: What's in my Win10 What's in my Mac? What's in my Android What's in my iPad 😋What's this？ ¶ Personal knowledge database wiki library，GPL license，Welcome 👏pull request Cookbook —— Personal knowledge database wiki library 🤯what exactly Include ？ ¶ I will share different kinds of note in my learning process , *including front-end back-end blog algorithm blog sofeware and so on…… *. 👏 Welcome pull request again! At present, this plan has just began, I will update as soon as possible. 🧐How to build？ ¶ Mainly using MkDocs -Project documentation with Markdown. MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator that's geared towards building project documentation. Documentation source files are written in Markdown, and configured with a single YAML configuration file. The default theme of mkdocs is ugly，so I choose to use Material theme . Material is a theme for MkDocs, an excellent static site generator geared towards project documentation. It is built using Google's Material Design guidelines. just a simple command mkdocs gh-deploy , then you can deploy it in Github pages. Now this project is deployed not only GitHub Pages ，but also readthedoc ，but the readthedoc version can only using the default theme. ⚑ I will write a more concrete article to help your guys to learn it later. 🧐How to Contribute？ ¶ - You can edit the article simply click the button - or you can pull request to my repo 📒 Cookbook ©roseauhan. Released under the GPL License. Author & maintainer: roseauhan. @Blog - @GitHub - @Instagram
docs.title: Cookbook

docs.text: Personal knowledge database wiki library，GPL license，Welcome 👏pull request Cookbook —— Personal knowledge database wiki library

docs.text: Mainly using MkDocs -Project documentation with Markdown. MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator that's geared towards building project documentation. Documentation source files are written in Markdown, and configured with a single YAML configuration file. The default theme of mkdocs is ugly，so I choose to use Material theme . Material is a theme for MkDocs, an excellent static site generator geared towards project documentation. It is built using Google's Material Design guidelines. just a simple command mkdocs gh-deploy , then you can deploy it in Github pages. Now this project is deployed not only GitHub Pages ，but also readthedoc ，but the readthedoc version can only using the default theme. ⚑ I will write a more concrete article to help your guys to learn it later.

docs.text: What's in my Android 📱 ? ¶ title: What's in my Android ? summary: record and share my own Android applications. authors: - roseau date: 2019-08-15 lastUpdate: 2019-8-15 This ia a list of my own personal Android applications, including 2 categories : Google series and other utils. What's in my Android 📱 ? 📝Note that 🏄‍ Google Series 🚧 Other Utils Feel free to star and fork . 📝Note that ¶ means open source , click to open open source repo; means free to use, or free personal license; 💰means must pay to use or need to pay for premium features; means Google Play Store hyperlink; 🏄‍ Google Series ¶ Name Property Description Install Others Gboard Gboard has everything you love about Google Keyboard—speed and reliability, Glide Typing, voice typing, and more—plus Google Search built in. No more app switching; just search and share, right from your keyboard. Gboard Chrome Google Chrome is a fast, easy to use, and secure web browser. Chrome Keep Capture inspiration when it strikes! Keep is simply the quickest way to offload ideas, thoughts, and to-dos without losing focus. Google Keep Photos 💰 FREE UNLIMITED STORAGE, VISUAL SEARCH, SMART AUTOMATIC ALBUMS, almost the best photo application in the world. Google Photos Podcast Google Podcasts is a new podcast player for Android users, where they can discover and listen to the world’s podcasts. Google Podcast Calender Get the official Google Calendar app for your Android phone and tablet to save time and make the most of every day. Calender Gmail Gmail is an easy to use email app that saves you time and keeps your messages safe. Get your messages instantly via push notifications, read and respond online & offline, and find any message quickly. Gmail Youtube 💰 See what the world is watching. YouTuBe 🚧 Other Utils ¶ Name Property Description Install Sharedr Sharedr improves sharing on Android by extending its native functionality and adding some cherries on top. sharedr POCO launcher fast and lightweight launcher designed especially for Android phones. High performance and gorgeous design will give your device a boost of confidence. Play with Home screen wallpapers, themes, and animations; personalize your device to make it truly unique. POCO Launcher Shadowsocks Freedom is something worth fighting for. Shadowsocks Instagram Instagram is a simple way to capture and share the world’s moments. Instagram Spotify 💰 With Spotify, you can play millions of songs and podcasts for free. Listen to the songs and podcasts you love and enjoy music from all over the world. spotify Pocket 💰 Use Pocket to capture the content that comes at you all day long, and curate your own space filled with only the topics you care about.SAVE ANYWHERE, READ ANYWHERE. Pocket Feedly 💰 Your central place to organize, read, and share the information you need to stay ahead of the next big trend in your industry. Feedly Swipes Swipes hasbeen voted as one of the world’s top 5 productivity apps with a Best New Startup prize by Evernote and a nomination for a Webby Award. Swipes Telegram X An alternative Tlegram client based on TDLib, with higher speed, slicker animations and experimental features. Telegram X NOMO 💰 NOMO was desgned to help casual photographers to focus on taking pictures, instead of all the post-production retouches. NOMO Snapmod 💰 Snapmod lets you to easily add your screenshots into device frames. You can use it to share your screenshots, wallpapers or apps mockups. Snapmod 微信读书 💰 让阅读不再孤单 微信读书 豆瓣 豆瓣，你的书影音世界。 豆瓣 钱迹 钱迹，一款纯粹记账的App，将每一笔收支都清晰记录在手机，一目了然知道钱花在哪里了，是一个无开屏，无广告，无后台的三无产品。 钱迹 HandShaker HandShaker 是连接手机和电脑之间的文件传输及管理工具 Handshaker Village Village（原百度山寨云Village Cloud）是一款集网盘搜索功能于一体的第三方百度网盘安卓客户端。 Village WPS The aim of WPS Office is to provide you one-stop working solution since 1989. Various of office tools and unique and intuitive UI design ensures you enjoy the best mobile office experience. WPS Bilibili Bilibili is a video sharing website themed around animation, comic, and game based in China, where users can submit, view, and add commentary subtitles on videos. bilibili 高德地图 高德地图---中国专业的手机地图，超过7亿用户正在使用！高德地图拥有全面精准的地点信息，特色语音导航、智能路线规划；省流量、耗电低、空间占用小、体验流畅，是您贴心的生活助手！ Amap Keep Keep - 家庭健身助手 & 免费私人教练，根据你等目标专业提供每天的锻炼计划。仅需几分钟， 无需任何器械 ，你就可以在家里锻炼肌肉，塑造体型。 Keep 看理想 💰 专注原创音视频内容，打造一个陪你成长的知识剧场。 看理想

docs.text: What's in my Mac  ? ¶ title: What's in my Mac ? summary: record and share my own Mac applications. authors: - roseau date: 2019-08-13 lastUpdate: 2019-8-14  This ia a list of my own personal Mac applications, including four categories : What's in my Mac  ? 📝Note that 👨🏻‍💻 Development 🛠 Utils 📖 Document 🎨 Create Feel free to star and fork . 📝Note that ¶ means open source , click to open open source repo; means free to use, or free personal license; means App store hyperlink; means hyperlink to a corresponding Awesome list for the item; 💰means must pay to use or need to pay for premium features; 👨🏻‍💻 Development ¶ Name Property Description Install Others iTerm2 is a replacement for Terminal and the successor to iTerm. brew cask install iterm2 Powerful GUI platform to make your API development faster & easier, from building API requests through testing, documentation and sharing. brew cask install postman 💰 Navicat Premium is a database development tool that allows you to simultaneously connect to MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, . Navicat premium A more simple, secure, and faster web browser than ever, with Google's smarts built-in. brew cask install google-chrome Visual Studio Code is a code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications. brew cask install visual-studio-code Essential IDE for iOS/macOS development. App Store Offical WeChat mini program development devtools. brew cask install wechatwebdevtools Offical qq mini program development devtools. qq devtools SF Symbols provides a set of over 1,500 consistent, highly configurable symbols you can use in yourapp. SF Symbols 🛠 Utils ¶ Name Property Description Install Others Simple but useful unzip tool. App Store 💰 Easily download videos from thousands of different sites. brew cask install downie A full-featured download manager.Support downloading HTTP, FTP, BitTorrent, Magnet, Baidu Net Disk etc. brew cask install motrix 任何设备，随时随地实现文件共享 brew cask install nutstore Move and resize windows with ease. Window control with simple and customizable keyboard shortcuts brew cask install spectacle Clipboard extension app for macOS. brew cask install clipy the most awesome keep-awake utility ever created for macOS. App store 在 Mac 电脑上也可以方便自如地管理你在 Android 手机中的内容 brew cask install handshaker remind you to take regular breaks that help you relieve eye train. App Store 💰 Stream Hundreds of live TV channels. http://www.cloudtvapp.net/ A tiny tool to re-mount write-protected NTFS volumes brew cask install mounty The best sina Weibo client on Mac. App Store 💰 Bartender 3 lets you organize your menu bar icons, by hiding them, rearranging them, show hidden items with a click or keyboard shortcut and have icons show when they update. brew cask install bartender 💰 iStat Menus for Mac OS X is an excellent software to monitor theperformance of Mac computers. brew cask install istat-menus The modern video player for macOS. Based on mpv, the powerful media player project. brew cask install inna hest-quality GIF converter App Store 💰 It cleans megatons of junk and makes your computer run faster. brew cask install cleanmymac 📖 Document ¶ Name Property Description Install Others a markdown editor, markdown reader. brew cask install typora 💰 A new tool that blends your everyday work apps into one. It's the all-in-one workspace for you and yourteam. brew cask install notion 💰 Microsoft Word 💰 Microsoft Excel 💰 Beautiful template for Microsoft work suite. 💰 Microsoft PPT 💰 MIND MAP & BRAINSTORM IDEAS App Store 💰 Integrating powerful tools for book annoation, mindmapping, flashcards and more, to build up your reading notes as never before. brew cask install marginnote 💰 Get PDF Expert to easily read, annotate, fill out, sign and edit PDF documents Website uPic is a native, powerful, beautiful and simple picture and file upload tool for macOS. brew cask install upic Awesome full-featured rss client. Website 🎨 Create ¶ Name Property Description Install Others 💰 **Sketch is a design toolkit built to help you create your best work — from your earliest ideas, through to final artwork.* brew cask install sketch 💰 Adobe Photoshop is a raster graphics editor developed and published by Adobe Inc. for Windows and macOS. Website 💰 Adobe XD is built for today's UX/UI designers, with intuitive tools thateliminate speed bumps and make everyday tasks feel effortless. Website 💰 Final Cut Pro is a series of non-linear video editing software programs firstdeveloped by Macromedia Inc. and later Apple Inc. Webstie 💰 Rotato is an app for your Mac that lets you create, capture, and animate 3D mockups for your digitaldesigns in a matter of seconds. Website 💰 Screenflick is a very high performance Mac screen recorder providing the highest quality capture of yourscreen, system audio, microphone, camera, and even displaying keystrokes and mouse clicks. Website HandBrake is an open-source, GPL-licensed, multiplatform, multithreaded video transcoder. brew cask install handbreak 💰 RightFont 5 Professional font management app for Mac. brew cask intall rightfont Batch resize and watermark your images fast and easy. Prepare your photos for posting on the web, sending to a client or for a print lab. App Store
docs.title: Mac App

docs.text: What's in my Win10 ? ¶ title: What's in my Win10 ? summary: record and share my own Win10 applications. authors: - roseau date: 2019-08-17 lastUpdate: 2019-8-17  This ia a list of my own personal Win10 applications, including 3 categories : What's in my Win10 ? 📝Note that ✈️ Awesome 🚧 Dev 🛹 Utils Feel free to star and fork . 📝Note that ¶ means open source , click to open open source repo; means free to use, or free personal license; 💰means must pay to use or need to pay for premium features; ✈️ Awesome ¶ Name Property Description Install Others Listary 💰 Listary – A truly amazing and polished search utility that is somewhere between a launcher and a file manager, both but neither. listary Doc QuickLook Bring macOS “Quick Look” feature to Windows. MicroSoft Store Github Dism++ Dism++ 是一个强大同时轻量易用的小工具，集系统清理、优化、启动项管理、驱动管理等许多常用 Windows 设置与一身，轻点鼠标就可以完成原先繁琐的操作。 Internet Sspai Shadowsocks If you want to keep a secret, you must also hide it from yourself. Github 🚧 Dev ¶ Name Property Description Install Others A more simple, secure, and faster web browser than ever, with Google's smarts built-in. Chrome Visual Studio Code is a code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications. VS Code Hyper A terminal built on web technologies, beautiful and powerful Hyper WSL The Windows Subsystem for Linux lets developers run a GNU/Linux environment -- including most command-line tools, utilities, and applications -- directly on Windows, unmodified, without the overhead of a virtual machine. Doc 🛹 Utils ¶ Name Property Description Install Others Bandzip All-in-One Archiver Bandzip Sspai Potplayer PotPlayer is a multimedia software player developedfor the Microsoft Windows operating system by SouthKorean Internet company Kakao. Potplayer zhihu Typora Typora will give you a seamless experience as both a reader and a writer. Great markdown application . Typora Sspai 💰 超赞！一款全新的思维导图软件。 Xind zen xmind XODO With Xodo, you can edit, annotate, sign, and share **PDF**s on desktop, mobile, and web. Xodo makes working with PDFs quick and easy, so you can get things done. xodo Tim QQ alternative application, Minimalist and Efficient 💰 Ex - Apple engineers turn your iPad into a second display . With zero lag. duet

docs.text: What's in my iPad  ? ¶ title: What's in my iPad ? summary: record and share my own iPad applications. authors: - roseau date: 2019-08-16 lastUpdate: 2019-8-16  This ia a list of my own personal iPad applications What's in my iPad  ? 📝Note that 🥳iPad App Feel free to star and fork . 📝Note that ¶ means open source , click to open open source repo; means free to use, or free personal license; 💰means must pay to use or need to pay for premium features; 🥳iPad App ¶ Name Property Description Install 💰 Bilibili is a video sharing website themed around animation, comic, and game based in China, where users can submit, view, and add commentary subtitles on videos. Bilibili HD 💰 Coursera is an American online learning platform founded by Stanford professors Andrew Ng and Daphne Koller that offers massive open online courses, specializations, and degrees. Coursera 💰 Ex - Apple engineers turn your iPad into a second display .
